body:
When I try to install Fenics using
```
spack install fenics
```
I get the following error
```
bin/spack install fenics
==> Error: No available compiler version matches 'None' on operating_system fedora25
Run 'spack compilers' to see available compiler Options.
```

Spack compilers reports the following:
```
==> Available compilers
-- gcc ----------------------------------------------------------
gcc@5.3.1  gcc@4.9.4
```

Other apps install fine.
title: Fenics fails to build with compiler error
